Items.Title:
NEW YORK CITY COUNCIL FISCAL YEAR 2024 EXECUTIVE BUDGET HEARINGS

*Begins 10:00   - Public

*Members of the public can testify in-person in the Council Chambers or virtually via Zoom Web and/or via Phone by registering at least 24 hours in advance of the hearing at https://council.nyc.gov/testify/
Written testimony may be submitted up to 72 hours after the hearing has been adjourned.

For questions about accessibility or to request additional accommodations at the May 24, 2023  Public Hearing, please contact swerts@council.nyc.gov or nbenjamin@council.nyc.gov or (212) 788-6936 at least three (3) business days before the hearing.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
